articles.title: Video: See how DeSantis addressed FBI's Mar-a-Lago search at rally - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Kyung Lah goes inside the first large Republican rally since the FBI searched Trump's Mar-A-Lago residence, where Florida Gov. Ron Desantis (R) headlined the event.

articles.author: Opinion by Dean Obeidallah
articles.title: Opinion: Once a proud law and order party, the GOP is taking aim at the FBI
articles.description: Republicans have been quick to defend former President Donald Trump after the FBI carried out a court-authorized search of his Mar-a-Lago property, but Dean Obeidallah wants to know where the GOP's outrage is over threats to the bureau.
articles.content: Dean Obeidallah, a former attorney, is the host of SiriusXM radio's daily program "The Dean Obeidallah Show" and a columnist for The Daily Beast. Follow him @DeanObeidallah. The opinions expressed in… [+5359 chars]

articles.title: Video: CNN analysis raises security concerns at Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort  - CNN Video
articles.description: A CNN review of former President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort raises new concerns over the home being able to meet the standards needed to store classified documents. CNN's Brian Todd reports.

articles.author: Zachary B. Wolf
articles.title: The number of people with Top Secret clearance will shock you

articles.author: Katelyn Polantz and Hannah Rabinowitz, CNN
articles.title: DOJ opposes making public details in Mar-a-Lago search warrant's probable cause affidavit
articles.description: The Justice Department is opposing the release of details in an affidavit that lays out the argument that investigators made to a federal magistrate judge explaining the probable cause it had to search former President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago estate last we…

articles.author: Opinion by Norman Eisen, Asha Rangappa and Dennis Aftergut
articles.title: Opinion: Trump is worried after FBI search -- and he should be
articles.description: Trump's groundless caterwauling this past week proves he's concerned about possible prosecution. He should be. There are just too many ongoing investigations to think that he can dodge them all, write Norman Eisen, Asha Rangappa and Dennis Aftergut

articles.title: Academy apologizes to Sacheen Littlefeather, who refused an Oscar on Marlon Brando's behalf

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Republicans pressure Garland as intrigue deepens over search of Trump home
articles.description: The FBI's stunning search of ex-President Donald Trump's home triggered a legal and political earthquake whose aftershocks are only widening a week on, with key questions that will shape the nation's future still clouded in mystery.
